					Inner Classes
DESCRIPTION
This section will guide you to:
• Create a Java project in your IDE
• Write a Java program to create inner classes


	package innerclasses;
	public class innerClass 
	{
		public static void main(String[] args) 
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
			student st = new student();
			student.stuDetails s = st.new stuDetails();
			s.display(45, "Liz");
		}
	}
	class student 
	{
		class stuDetails 
		{
			void display(int x, String y) 
			{
			System.out.println("Student ID : " + x);
			System.out.println("Student Name : " + y);
			}
		}
	}
	
	
OUTPUT

Student ID : 45
Student Name : Liz
